sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FaCode, FaRobot, FaMusic, FaPalette, FaTheaterMasks, FaCamera, FaChess, FaGlobe, FaLeaf, FaBook } from 'react-icons/fa'; import '../styles/animations.css'; const clubs = [ { id: 1, name: "Coding Club", icon: , description: "A community of passionate programmers dedicated to fostering technical innovation. We organize coding competitions, hackathons, and workshops on latest technologies. Members get hands-on experience with real-world projects and mentorship from industry experts.", activities: ["Weekly Coding Challenges", "Hackathons", "Tech Workshops", "Project Collaborations"], color: "blue" }, { id: 2, name: "Robotics Club", icon: , description: "Exploring the fascinating world of robotics and automation. Our members work on innovative robotics projects, participate in national competitions, and learn about AI, machine learning, and mechanical engineering.", activities: ["Robot Building", "AI Integration", "Competition Prep", "Research Projects"], color: "purple" }, { id: 3, name: "Music Club", icon: , description: "A vibrant community of musicians and music enthusiasts. We organize concerts, jam sessions, and music workshops. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced musician, there's a place for you here.", activities: ["Live Performances", "Music Workshops", "Band Formation", "Annual Concert"], color: "pink" }, { id: 4, name: "Art Club", icon: , description: "Celebrating creativity through various forms of visual arts. Our members explore painting, sketching, digital art, and more. We organize exhibitions, workshops, and collaborative art projects.", activities: ["Art Exhibitions", "Workshops", "Competition Entries", "Community Projects"], color: "yellow" }, { id: 5, name: "Drama Club", icon: , description: "Bringing stories to life through theatrical performances. We produce plays, organize acting workshops, and participate in inter-college theater festivals. Join us to develop your acting, directing, and production skills.", activities: ["Theater Productions", "Acting Workshops", "Script Writing", "Festival Participation"], color: "red" }, { id: 6, name: "Photography Club", icon: , description: "Capturing moments and telling stories through the lens. Learn photography techniques, participate in photo walks, and showcase your work in exhibitions. We cover everything from basic photography to advanced post-processing.", activities: ["Photo Walks", "Exhibitions", "Technical Workshops", "Competition Entries"], color: "indigo" }, { id: 7, name: "Chess Club", icon: , description: "Developing strategic thinking through the royal game. We organize regular tournaments, training sessions, and simultaneous exhibitions with masters. All skill levels are welcome to join and improve.", activities: ["Tournaments", "Training Sessions", "Team Matches", "Strategy Workshops"], color: "gray" }, { id: 8, name: "Global Connect Club", icon: , description: "Promoting cultural exchange and global awareness. We organize international cultural festivals, language exchange programs, and discussions on global issues. Connect with students from around the world.", activities: ["Cultural Events", "Language Exchange", "Global Discussions", "International Food Fest"], color: "green" }, { id: 9, name: "Environmental Club", icon: , description: "Working towards a sustainable future. We organize environmental awareness campaigns, tree plantations, and waste management initiatives. Join us in making our campus and community more eco-friendly.", activities: ["Green Initiatives", "Awareness Campaigns", "Campus Clean-ups", "Sustainability Projects"], color: "emerald" }, { id: 10, name: "Literary Club", icon: , description: "Fostering love for literature and creative writing. We organize book discussions, writing workshops, and poetry slams. Publish your work in our annual magazine and develop your literary skills.", activities: ["Writing Workshops", "Book Discussions", "Poetry Slams", "Magazine Publication"], color: "amber" } ]; function About() { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Vibrant Community

Discover the diverse clubs and communities that make our campus life exciting and enriching. Join the ones that interest you and be part of something amazing!

{/* Clubs Grid */}
{clubs.map((club) => (
{club.icon}

{club.name}

{club.description}

Key Activities:

    {club.activities.map((activity, index) => (
  • {activity}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Join Section */}

Ready to Join?

Contact the respective club coordinators or visit the club rooms to learn more and become a member.

); } export default About;
